name: Apptics-Swift
summary: An events tracking and analytics library for iOS

description:
What's new:

- Added localisation for Cross Promotion apps screen. 

- Added a few items to the CrossPromoTheme class to customise Cross Promotion screen. 

- Provided callbacks to get Cross Promotion module errors.

- Fixed Cross Promotion stats update api failure.
